hero.name: Von Breznev A. Mendres
hero.tagline: 「The day you stop learning is the day you stop living.」

about.title: About Me
about.p1: Hi everyone, I’m Von, a Filipino student in Taiwan. I'm currently in my third year of Computer Science at Southern Taiwan University of Science and Technology (STUST).
about.p2: Guided by my personal motto, “The day you stop learning is the day you stop living,” I am passionate about growing my skills, tackling new challenges, and seeking new opportunities.
about.p3: I am currently seeking an internship opportunity in Taiwan. I am very eager to apply my knowledge, acquire new skills, and actively contribute to team goals, while achieving professional growth through practical experience.

description: Fine-tuned a Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) using PyTorch and FastAI for a multi-class image classification task, achieving 98% accuracy on the test set.
Developed and deployed the fine-tuned model as an end-to-end application on Hugging Face Spaces, creating an interactive demo for real-time inference.
Built practical computer vision utilities using OpenCV for object detection, implementing algorithms to identify and localize objects within static images.
Instructed a diverse audience of working professionals, graduate students, college, and high-school students in Business and Daily English topics.
Designed and executed tailored lesson plans to meet specific industry needs and professional development goals of adult learners.
Distilled complex subject matter into clear, understandable, and engaging lessons, demonstrating strong communication and presentation skills.
Developed and implemented a specialized speaking curriculum from the ground up, focusing on improving student fluency, pronunciation, and confidence.
Adapted teaching materials and methodologies to effectively engage students across a wide range of ages (elementary to junior high school) and proficiency levels.
Managed classroom dynamics to foster a disciplined, supportive, and active learning environment.

education.title: Southern Taiwan University of Science and Technology

pet_classifier.title: AI Pet Species Classifier
pet_classifier.introduction: Fine-tuned ResNet34 and optimized hyperparameters to boost model accuracy from 76% to 98%.
pet_classifier.description: Built an end-to-end image classifier using PyTorch and FastAI without relying on pre-built APIs. Improved model accuracy from a 76% baseline to 98% through data augmentation and learning rate optimization. Implemented model serialization and deployed the solution to Hugging Face Spaces with a Gradio web interface for real-time inference.

skyvision.title: SkyVision AI
skyvision.introduction: Trained and deployed a deep learning model that classifies birds, airplanes, and Superman with 98% accuracy.
skyvision.description: This project trains a ResNet34 model using FastAI and PyTorch on a custom dataset scraped from Google Images, then deploys it to Hugging Face Spaces with an interactive Gradio web app. Users can upload images and test the model in real time, showcasing practical machine learning deployment skills.

portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio
portfolio.introduction: Designed and developed a modern, fully responsive portfolio website to showcase my skills, experience, and projects.
portfolio.description: Built from scratch with Next.js and TypeScript, this site emphasizes performance and accessibility. It features smooth animations with Framer Motion, a clean Tailwind CSS layout, and is deployed on Vercel, serving as my professional hub online.

traffic_light.title: Voice-Controlled Smart Traffic Light
traffic_light.introduction: Created an IoT prototype traffic light system that responds to voice commands in real time.
traffic_light.description: A mobile app captures voice commands and sends them via MQTT to an ESP 32, which controls LEDs to simulate traffic signals. This project demonstrates my ability to combine voice recognition, wireless communication, and embedded systems for interactive hardware solutions.

aura_notes.title: Aura Notes
aura_notes.introduction: Developed a secure, full-stack note-taking application with authentication and smooth animations.
aura_notes.description: This MERN app features JWT-based authentication, a stylish glassmorphism UI built with Tailwind CSS and React, and animated transitions powered by Framer Motion. Notes are stored in MongoDB with a Node.js/Express API for reliable data management.

filmfolio.title: FilmFolio
filmfolio.introduction: Built a cloud-native movie management system with automated CI/CD, Redis caching, and near-zero downtime deployment on GCP.
filmfolio.description: A full-stack MERN application deployed on Google Cloud Platform's Cloud Run with Docker containers and automated CI/CD via GitHub Actions. Implements Redis Cache-aside pattern to accelerate queries across 1.3M TMDB movie records, reducing API latency and backend load. Features JWT authentication with GitHub Secrets and IAM for production security, frontend debouncing to reduce redundant requests by 50%+, and Cloud Logs monitoring for system health tracking. Achieves near-zero downtime with automatic scaling in the asia-east1 region.

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.intro: I'm open to new opportunities and collaborations. Feel free to send me a message using the form below or email me directly at <1>mendresvon@gmail.com</1>.

submitted.title: Thank you!
submitted.message: Your message has been sent. I'll get back to you shortly.
